mapper.insert: insert into comments values( SEQ_COMMENT.nextval, #{com_content}, sysdate, #{one_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pro_qna_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{re_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commu_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eco_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ets_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{member_no}, #{cer_no, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select c.no,TO_CHAR(com_regdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')com_regdate, nickname, com_content,member_no from comments c, member m where c.member_no=m.no and commu_no=#{no}
